title: Amazon Essentials Skinny Jeans for Women (Stretchy)
description: SKINNY FIT: Experience a snug fit with these stretchy skinny jeans for women that sit comfortably below the natural waist, great for all-day wear and versatile styling
HIGH STRETCH DENIM: Crafted from a cotton-blend denim, these women's stretchy jeans offer enhanced comfort and fit, allowing for movement throughout your day with style and ease
WARDROBE ESSENTIAL: These trendy women's jeans feature a slim silhouette, making them a versatile piece with various styling options for any occasion
DETAILS: Enjoy classic five-pocket styling, a zip fly, and shank button closure in these stretchy skinny jeans for women. All denim is unique and will vary in color due to wash, finish, and dye

INSEAM OPTIONS: Choose your ideal fit, including petite jeans for women and plus size jeans for women, with three inseam lengths for style and comfort inclusivity. Offered in 3 lengths - Short 27", Regular 29", & Long 31" each with a 4 7/8" leg opening on US size 6

Crafted from high-quality stretch denim, these women's skinny jeans provide a flattering, snug fit through the hip, thigh, and leg for a sleek silhouette that suits any occasion. Designed to offer all-day comfort, they come in sizes up to 20, with short, regular, and tall inseam lengths for a customized fit. Featuring authentic five-pocket styling, a zip fly, and a classic shank button closure, these jeans offer endless styling options perfect for dressing up or down. Elevate your wardrobe with versatile jeans that blend comfort, style, and fit.
